name: Music_4425.wav
keywords: ['movie song', 'drum roll', 'marching beat', 'guitar', 'organ', 'male narrator', 'bass', 'slow blues', 'slow tempo']
caption: This song features a male voice narrating a story in the beginning. This is followed by a drum roll in a marching beat style. A bass note is played which is the root note of the chord. An organ strikes a chord and plays it staccato style. A guitar also strikes a chord. There are no other instruments in this song. This song can be played in a movie trailer.
